name: FireChainer
description:
In the future, wars are fought online. You start working for an organization that finds and destroys rebel servers used by terrorists and criminals. At least, that's what they made you think.

FireChainer is a stealth game inspired by VR Missions and psx spy games.

Controls:

  • Arrows / left stick - Move
  • Shift / A - Crouch 

Developed by Edu Gargollo (twitter.com/edugargollo)
Music: http://www.purple-planet.com
